nodes.text: TB-2 was a 2-1B surgical droid stationed as a medic aboard the Twilight during the Clone Wars.

After the Battle of Teth, a 2-1B hologram named TB-2 was activated by Anakin Skywalker and his new Padawan, Ahsoka Tano, to diagnose the Huttlet Rotta's failing health. Sometime later, TB-2 was uploaded into a real 2-1B surgical droid body and remained aboard the Twilight.

Following the rescue of Jedi Master Plo Koon, Wolffe, Sgt. Sinker, and Boost after the Battle of Abregado, TB-2 aided the injured clone troopers, stabilizing them for transport to a Republic medical frigate.

During the Battle of Ryloth, TB-2 was stationed in the Venator-class Star Destroyer Resolute. He helped cure the injured Admiral Wullf Yularen, who was wounded during the attempt to break the blockade of the planet.
TB-2 is voiced by Tim Brock, the voice actor after whom the droid is named. Brock was also one of the leading texture artists for the show.
